description: Third-year Business Administration major with a minor in Engineering and Management. From Manchester, NH, but currently live in Savannah, GA. Fall '13 AM class, BK 1951. Big Patriots, Red Sox, and Celtics fan. Was featured in NCAA Football '14 with the designation of "Bench Warmer".
aspects: One of my favorite things about Lambda Chi is that I know that any single brother in the house would have my back. I also love all of the traditions, winning intramural teams, my P-bros (pledge brothers), how motivated and involved all of the brothers are, John's hot fire cooking, formals, semi-formals, and how the brothers around you are always pushing you to reach your full potential.
involve: Past: Georgia Tech Varsity Football Team (2012-13)
Current/Future: Georgia Tech Oxford Study Abroad (2014)
Scheller College of Business Student Development Board (2013-)
Medical Management Associates Project Analyst Co-Op (2013-)
Georgia Tech Department of Housing Resident Advisor (2013-2014)
interests: Beating Brother Tuna Gregory in sports
Spending quality time with the family and my puppy. And Tom Brady
quotes: "I would agree with you, but then we'd both be wrong."
name: Aaron Solender
